Page.Name: ProfitUI_ControlCenter

Button.Name: Startup
Button.OnPress:
Parent.OnShow=' ' Parent.WelcomeSkin.Press=true hide_window Custom.ProfitUI_ControlCenter show_window Custom.ProfitUI_SubclassDetector Parent.Parent.ProfitUI_BottomBar.ShowWindows.Press=true
Parent.Parent.ProfitUI_SubclassDetector.Detect.Press=true show_window MainHUD.StartButton MainHUD.StartButton.Visible=false hide_window MainHUD.StartButton show_window Custom.ProfitUI_InventoryColorSettings show_window Custom.ProfitUI_BottomBar
Data=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.EffectsIconSizes.TargetEffectsIconSize.Text Parent.EffectsSlidersFrame.TargetEffectsSizeSlider.Value=Data Parent.Parent.Target.Icons.IconSize=Data
Data=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.EffectsIconSizes.ImpliedTargetEffectsIconSize.Text Parent.EffectsSlidersFrame.ImpliedTargetEffectsSizeSlider.Value=Data Parent.Parent.ImpliedTarget.Icons.IconSize=Data
Data=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.EffectsIconSizes.BeneficialEffectsIconSize.Text Parent.EffectsSlidersFrame.BeneficialEffectsSizeSlider.Value=Data Parent.Parent.Effects.Volume.CellSize=Data ## "," ## Data
Data=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.EffectsIconSizes.DetrimentalEffectsIconSize.Text Parent.EffectsSlidersFrame.DetrimentalEffectsSizeSlider.Value=Data Parent.Parent.DetrimentalEffects.Volume.CellSize=Data ## "," ## Data
Data=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.GroupWindow.BackgroundOpacity.Text Parent.GroupBackgroundSliderFrame.GroupBackgroundSlider.Value=Data Parent.Parent.GroupMembers.Backdrop.BackgroundOpacity=Data / 100
Data=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.LootOptions.AutoDeclineLoot.Text Parent.AutoDeclineLoot.Checked=Data
Parent.Parent.Parent.Inventory.Loot.OnShow='Parent.ProfitUI_ControlCenter.LootAutoDecline.Activated=Parent.ProfitUI_ControlCenter.AutoDeclineLoot.Checked' Data=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.LootOptions.NBGGreedIsDefaultButton.Text 'Parent.Parent.Parent.Inventory.Loot.button NBGGreed.IsDefaultButton'=Data 'Parent.Parent.Parent.Inventory.Loot.button LootAll.IsDefaultButton'=true 'Parent.Parent.Parent.Inventory.Loot.button LottoDecline.IsDefaultButton'=true
Parent.Parent.Parent.PlayerHousing.PlayerHouse.EnterButton.IsDefaultButton=true Parent.Parent.Parent.Popup.Select.UserMovable=true
Parent.ShowAutoAttackCalc.Activated=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.AutoAttackCalc.ShowOnLogin.Text Parent.DoShowAutoAttackBar.Activated=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.AutoAttackBar.ShowOnLogin.Text Parent.ShowAutoAttackBar.checked=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.AutoAttackBar.ShowOnLogin.Text
Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_CuresCode.GetCancelSpellcastFromFile.Press=true

Page.Text: Execute UI script (only use if instructed to do so)

Button.Name: MaximizeBottomBarWidth
Button.Tooltip: Maximize the width of the bottom bar. You need to manually resize the bar in some way to get the size to save.

Checkbox.Name: AutoShow
Checkbox.OnPress:
window_property unlock Custom DrumsUI_ST_Auto Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_ST_Auto.Width=(COND ? 2 : 1) COND=(checked == true) window_property lock Custom DrumsUI_ST_Auto
Parent.Show_ST.visible=COND
Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('flash_window Custom.DrumsUI_ST 2') Parent.DoCommand.visible=COND Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('hide_window Custom.DrumsUI_ST') Parent.DoCommand.visible='!'COND
Checkbox.Tooltip: Display Duration, Target and Amount Remaining of Spells Edit _ProfitUI_DrumsUI_ST_Settings.txt to track spells

Button.Name: Spell Timer
Button.Tooltip: Display Duration, Target and Amount Remaining of Spells Edit _ProfitUI_DrumsUI_ST_Settings.txt to track spells

Page.Text: The settings below will not be permanent:

Checkbox.Name: ShowMail
Checkbox.Tooltip: Show/Hide the mail that was last opened from the mailbox during the same play session. No mail functionality.

Checkbox.Name: ShowBroker
Checkbox.Tooltip: Show/Hide the broker window. No functionality while not at a broker, must have been at the broker during the play session to have it populated with data.

Button.Name: DoShowAutoAttackBar
Button.OnActivate: parent.parent.parent.Custom.ProfitUI_AutoAttackBar.Data.IsHated.OnShow="show_window Custom.ProfitUI_AutoAttackBar" parent.parent.ProfitUI_AutoAttackBar.Data.IsHated.OnShow="show_window Custom.ProfitUI_AutoAttackBar" show_window Custom.ProfitUI_AutoAttackBar hide_window Custom.ProfitUI_AutoAttackBar.CombatCheck Activated=false

Checkbox.Name: ShowBankSlots
Checkbox.OnSet: show_window Inventory.Bank show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_0_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_1_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_2_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_3_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_4_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_5_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_6_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_7_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_8_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_9_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_10_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_11_-3' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_0_-4' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_1_-4' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_2_-4' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_3_-4' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_4_-4' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_5_-4' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_6_-4' show_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_7_-4'
Checkbox.OnUnset: hide_window Inventory.Bank hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_0_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_1_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_2_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_3_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_4_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_5_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_6_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_7_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_8_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_9_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_10_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_11_-3' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_0_-4' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_1_-4' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_2_-4' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_3_-4' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_4_-4' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_5_-4' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_6_-4' hide_window 'Inventory.Bag_clone_7_-4'
Checkbox.Tooltip: Show/Hide all bank containers (not the bank slots themselves) even while not at a bank. Only shows contents of the containers that have previously been opened from the bank window during the same play session. Also shows placeholders for containers that do not exist. No functionality while not at a bank.

Sliderbar.Name: GroupBackgroundSlider
Sliderbar.Tooltip: Changes will not save. You can edit the defaults in _ProfitUI_Settings_GroupWindow.txt

Sliderbar.Name: DetrimentalEffectsSizeSlider
Sliderbar.Tooltip: Changes will not save. You can edit the defaults in _ProfitUI_EffectsIconSizes.txt

Sliderbar.Name: BeneficialEffectsSizeSlider
Sliderbar.Tooltip: Changes will not save. You can edit the defaults in _ProfitUI_EffectsIconSizes.txt

Sliderbar.Name: ImpliedTargetEffectsSizeSlider
Sliderbar.Tooltip: Changes will not save. You can edit the defaults in _ProfitUI_Settings_EffectsIconSizes.txt

Sliderbar.Name: TargetEffectsSizeSlider
Sliderbar.Tooltip: Changes will not save. You can edit the defaults in _ProfitUI_Settings_EffectsIconSizes.txt

Checkbox.Name: DisableGroupQRB
Checkbox.Tooltip: Disable/Re-enable the quick raid buttons on the group window. This setting will not be saved between sessions.

Page.Checkbox: Disable macro buttons on group window

Checkbox.Name: AutoDeclineLoot
Checkbox.Tooltip: Automatically decline all loot (eg when mentoring). This setting will not be saved between sessions, but can be predefined in _ProfitUI_Settings_LootOptions.txt

Button.Name: ShowPortal
Button.Tooltip: Browse to the ProfitUI CE FAQ
